meta.title: Christopher West | UI Software Engineer & Artist
meta.description: Senior software engineer and traditional artist with expertise in React, Next.js, and front-end architecture. Explore my professional journey and artwork portfolio.

sections.title: Syracuse University
sections.description: Studied computer graphics with a focus on graphics programming. Traditionally trained artist with a flavor for special effects and procedural graphics programming.

projects.title: Traditinal Art - Colored Pencil
projects.description: Exploration of procedural generation techniques combined with traditional art principles. Created using custom shader programs.

projects.title: Traditinal Art - Oil on Canvas
projects.description: Final project demonstrating real-time graphics rendering with dynamic lighting and particle systems.

projects.title: Traditinal Art - Oil on Canvas

sections.title: Barnes & Noble.com
sections.description: Helped engineer BN.com’s Java-based e-commerce platform while practicing quick, iterative development cycles and robust A/B testing scenarios, wrapped in a clean templating environment. Worked closely with design and product owners, advising on UI/UX requirements. Translated Photoshop mock-ups and design decks into working, interactive, rich applications.

projects.title: Brand Experience Platform
projects.description: Interactive 3D product configurator built with WebGL, allowing customers to customize and visualize products in real-time.

projects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time data visualization system displaying complex metrics through intuitive, animated graphics.

sections.title: Zebra Technologies
sections.description: Led an engineering team that architected a desktop, native application using Electron to deliver our machine vision scanner software. Team lead for Zebra’s primary UI Front End group, managing a team of 5 engineers in migrating legacy applications to modern web apps.

projects.title: Brand Experience Platform
projects.description: Interactive 3D product configurator built with WebGL, allowing customers to customize and visualize products in real-time.

projects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time data visualization system displaying complex metrics through intuitive, animated graphics.

projects.title: UA.com NextJS Application
projects.description:
Developed and defined best practices for NextJS, React, and GraphQL applications; collaborated with Product and UX on our reusable component library to ensure design consistency.
Hands-on development of our eCommerce checkout (including 3rd party payment systems), product details, and listings page development, delivering several front-end solutions on time and within budget.

projects.title: UA.com Web Component Library
projects.description: Defined and documented web component code conventions across all web assets; spearheaded Storybook documentation and bundled/published UA's reusable component library. Collaborated with UX designers and engineers across multiple teams to maintain corporate design patterns, ensuring consistency across one of the world's most performant eCommerce sites.

outro.title: Let's Connect
outro.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out!
